desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.thai: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.ko: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求日步美介紹黑市，以作為讓她從小流氓手中脫險的代價。因此一行人便與步美同行一段時間。另一方面，便利屋68的社長亞瑠，為了挽回之前的敗仗而尋找借用資金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi was more familiar with the Market, everyone asked her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi was more familiar with the Market, everyone asked her to lead the way for them.
desc.thai: As Hifumi was more familiar with the Market, everyone asked her to lead the way for them.
desc.ko: As Hifumi was more familiar with the Market, everyone asked her to lead the way for them.
desc.zh_tw: 因為日步美對於黑市比較熟悉，眾人於是邀請她為眾人帶路。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为日步美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为日步美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为日步美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。

家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.
desc.jp: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.
desc.thai: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.
desc.ko: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.
desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68任務失敗，讓PMC方面大為震驚，認為絕對是資料出了問題。黑服認為資料絕對無誤，決定去調查具體原因。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Failing the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decided to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seemed to have her own way.

desc.zh_tw: 任務失利加上資金耗盡，便利屋於是決定前去貸款。雖然亞瑠的賬號已經因被風紀委員會通緝而被凍結，但亞瑠顯然有自己的路子

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.thai: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.ko: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚對再戰阿拜多斯一行人而擔憂，遙香則佈置好了炸彈。無月不解為什麼亞瑠不先收錢辦事，亞瑠則說是怕被顧客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。

desc.en: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.thai: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.ko: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_tw: 中間有人提出了回到格黑娜的選項，但佳代子謹慎分析了形勢，認為由於有風紀委員會，尤其是陽奈的存在，他們幾乎沒有勝算，回去其實挺不實際的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Sensei met Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino left in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talked about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.jp: Sensei met Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino left in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talked about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.thai: Sensei met Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino left in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talked about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.ko: Sensei met Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino left in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talked about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在對策委員會的教室遇見了野乃美與星野。星野有事先行離開了。野乃美隨後跟老師提起了以前的星野以及她的前輩。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Hoshino left school and had a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit recalled the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to oppose".
desc.jp: Hoshino left school and had a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit recalled the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to oppose".
desc.thai: Hoshino left school and had a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit recalled the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to oppose".
desc.ko: Hoshino left school and had a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit recalled the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to oppose".
desc.zh_tw: 星野離開了學校，去見了黑服。黑服重新提起了所謂提案，並聲稱會給她一個“無法拒絕的條件”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
